songs.title: Interlude
songs.lyrics:
[Kid Mescudi]
Yo! Yo, what up, Mel? Yo man, it‘s Scott man. Hit me up whenever you get this dawg. You know what I’m sayin’, I got these, you know what I’m sayin’, beats and shit that I just made up at Chris' house. Now man, so if you tryna do that man, just hit me up man, let me know what’s up man cause um, know what I’m sayin’, I’m ready to drop these, know what I’m sayin’. I might just go to studio tonight man, just holla at it man, just do it. But um, yeah just hit me back whenever man. You know what I’m sayin’. I be at the crib. You know what I’m sayin’. You can hit up, you can hit the sale man. Alright
One
